body_html: Maybe I'm not thinking about the computational graph correctly, but in my second snippet, shouldn't any strong reference related to x be broken when x is re-assigned, thereby allowing garbage collection?

body: Maybe I'm not thinking about the computational graph correctly, but in my second snippet, shouldn't any strong reference related to `x` be broken when `x` is re-assigned, thereby allowing garbage collection?
